schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis step run

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting bulk RNA-seq pipeline GENCODE comprehensive unique category counts
title: GENCODE category quality metric

___unitary_pseudogene.description: A species-specific unprocessed pseudogene without a parent gene, as it has an active orthologue in another species.
___unitary_pseudogene.title: unitary pseudogene

___IG_C_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___IG_C_gene.title: IgC gene

___TR_C_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___TR_C_gene.title: TRC gene

___miRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___miRNA.title: miRNA

___vaultRNA.description: Short non coding RNA gene that forms part of the vault ribonucleoprotein complex.
___vaultRNA.title: vaultRNA

___snRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___snRNA.title: snRNA

___macro_lncRNA.description: Unspliced lncRNA that is several kb in size.
___macro_lncRNA.title: macro lncRNA

___non_coding.description: Transcript which is known from the literature to not be protein coding.
___non_coding.title: non coding

___sRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___sRNA.title: sRNA

___unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that can contain introns since produced by gene duplication.
___unprocessed_pseudogene.title: unprocessed pseudogene

___TEC.description: To be Experimentally Confirmed. This is used for non-spliced EST clusters that have polyA features. This category has been specifically created for the ENCODE project to highlight regions that could indicate the presence of protein coding genes that require experimental validation, either by 5' RACE or RT-PCR to extend the transcripts, or by confirming expression of the putatively-encoded peptide with specific antibodies.
___TEC.title: TEC

___transcribed_processed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
___transcribed_processed_pseudogene.title: transcribed processed pseudogene

___scaRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___scaRNA.title: scaRNA

___ribozyme.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___ribozyme.title: ribozyme

___sense_overlapping.description: Long non-coding transcript that contains a coding gene in its intron on the same strand.
___sense_overlapping.title: sense overlapping

___translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that has mass spec data suggesting that it is also translated.
___translated_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: translated unprocessed pseudogene

___polymorphic_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene owing to a SNP/DIP but in other individuals/haplotypes/strains the gene is translated.
___polymorphic_pseudogene.title: polymorphic pseudogene

___pseudogene.description: Have homology to proteins but generally suffer from a disrupted coding sequence and an active homologous gene can be found at another locus. Sometimes these entries have an intact coding sequence or an open but truncated ORF, in which case there is other evidence used (for example genomic polyA stretches at the 3' end) to classify them as a pseudogene. Can be further classified as one of the following.
___pseudogene.title: pseudogene

___TR_V_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___TR_V_gene.title: TRV gene

___sense_intronic.description: Long non-coding transcript in introns of a coding gene that does not overlap any exons.
___sense_intronic.title: sense intronic

___processed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene that lack introns and is thought to arise from reverse transcription of mRNA followed by reinsertion of DNA into the genome.
___processed_pseudogene.title: processed pseudogene

___misc_RNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___misc_RNA.title: misc RNA

___IG_V_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___IG_V_gene.title: IgV gene

___transcribed_unprocessed_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
___transcribed_unprocessed_pseudogene.title: transcribed unprocessed pseudogene

___IG_J_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___IG_J_gene.title: IgJ gene

___rRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___rRNA.title: rRNA

___TR_J_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___TR_J_gene.title: TRJ gene

___number_of_genes_detected.description: Number of genes detected at > 1 TPM
___number_of_genes_detected.title: gene

___Mt_tRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___Mt_tRNA.title: Mt tRNA

___snoRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___snoRNA.title: snoRNA

___transcribed_unitary_pseudogene.description: Pseudogene where protein homology or genomic structure indicates a pseudogene, but the presence of locus-specific transcripts indicates expression.
___transcribed_unitary_pseudogene.title: transcribed unitary pseudogene

___lincRNA.description: Long, intervening noncoding (linc) RNA that can be found in evolutionarily conserved, intergenic regions.
___lincRNA.title: lincRNA

___IG_D_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___IG_D_gene.title: IgD gene

___TR_D_gene.description: Immunoglobulin (Ig) variable chain and T-cell receptor (TcR) genes imported or annotated according to the IMGT.
___TR_D_gene.title: TRD gene

___Mt_rRNA.description: Non-coding RNA predicted using sequences from Rfam and miRBase
___Mt_rRNA.title: Mt rRNA
